headline: Fitch Affirms Viatris at 'BBB' and 'F2'; Outlook Revised to Negative
summary: Fitch Ratings has affirmed Viatris Inc.'s Long- and Short-Term Issuer Default Ratings at 'BBB' and 'F2', respectively.Fitch has also and affirmed the 'BBB' Long-Term IDRs for Mylan, Inc. and Utah...
